name: Areaone IRC Daemon
short_description: The Areaone IRCd is an extensive implementation of the irc protocol, based off of the Twilight IRCd (dreamforge based). Includes Oper host masking, increased serv<->serv efficiency, improved security, Bahamut-style nicks, some hybrid features, and more.
